section.title: What's New
section.para:
New features.
Improved automatic transition choices when randomizing effects (see ).
Eight new diagonal wipe transitions. Reversed direction of left and right wipe transitions out. Reversed direction of left and right skew transitions in.
Windows Media Video support. Shows can be created in Windows Media (*.wmv) format. QuickTime is no longer required to create videos.
New Gray tone effect. Much improved Sepia tone effect.
New custom pan and zoom effect editor. Create unique "Ken Burns documentary" style effects with your photos (see ).
Support for locking transitions and effects for a photo (see ). now applies to all unlocked photos, independent of which are selected.
Support for adding Flash files (*.swf) to a show (see ).
Menu item to manage uploaded shows (see ).
Simplified controls for selecting show type to create (see ).
Remember last theme selected across application restarts.
MP3 playlist (.m3u) editor for sequencing multiple music tracks (see ).
Effect and transition preview with or without themes (see ).
Display dialog after creating a show offering tools that apply to the show (see );
More accurate progress display when creating a show, offers more feedback when creating long shows.
Support for launching neoDVD DVD burning application if installed. When creating a video, neoDVD can be used to burn a DVD (see ).
Checkbox to select high quality mode for use when creating video shows (see ).
Support setting the playback frame rate of the show (see ).
New effects. "Pan left to right" across the top half of the zoomed photo. "Zoom in 50% (top center)" and "Zoom out 50% (top center)" - zoom in and out to the center of the top half of the photo.
Partition transition/effect dropdown lists so that the favorite transitions/effects are displayed first in the lists (see ).
Support theme thumbnails in the theme description (see ).

Features added in previous releases.
Transition and effect duration controls for each photo (see ).
Automatic time distribution control (see ).
Photo info tooltips (see ).
Photos and MP3 duration display (see ).
MP3 play list (.m3u) support.
Photo viewer (see ).
Sheriff's badge and Starburst transitions.
Photo caption support (see ).
